message:
Soak the parts in soapy water for 10 minutes [nid4] to get rid of residue and odor. Leave the basket [nid2] in the pan and fill it up with [nid3] enough hot water to cover all the dirty bits. Squeeze a few drops of dish detergent into the water and let the parts soak for 10 minutes or so. Rinse the parts out thoroughly and scrub any remaining residues off with a soft sponge. You can also [nid1] use a soft- bristled brush [nid0] to help loosen stuck- on food bits.

[STUDY] **Nimrod** (2002) "The Effects of Music on the Ability to Remember a List of Words", *Psychology of Music*, 30(1): 5-12. [DOI:10.1177/030573560203000101](http://dx.doi.org/10.1177/030573560203000101)

## [PREF] Introduction



The [pref] (preference) is a feature of the [app] (application) that allows for customization of the user experience. Users can configure the app to their liking by selecting from a set of options provided by the developer. These options are stored and retrieved through the [id] (identifier). The identifier is used as a key to access and store preferences data.

[ref] In this guide we will create an example app that has two preference items:

1. A boolean preference item called "dark_mode"
2. An integer preference item called "theme_color"

*Type the title of the book (in all caps) at the top of the first page.*

*On the second page, write a paragraph summarizing the plot. Make sure that you include the main characters, their roles, and what happens to them.*
